column1: #Text=Bolin says : " That 's Tahno and the Wolfbats , the reigning champs , three years running .
#Text=Now do n't mess with this guy , he 's a nasty dude .
#Text=" Tahno says : " Well , well , well , if it is n't the Fire Ferrets .
#Text=Tell me , how did a couple of amateurs like you luck your way into the tournament ?
#Text=You know , if you 'd like to learn how a real pro bends , I could give you some private lessons .
#Text=" Korra says : " You wan na go toe - to - toe with me , pretty boy ?
#Text=If you hit him , we 're out of the tournament .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Whoa , ho , ho , I 've never seen someone harass Tahno like that .
#Text=You are one of a kind , Korra .
